subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Denis Menchov catapulted from second place to first during the longest — and one of the most dangerous — time trials in cycling, while the American Levi Leipheimer moved into third.
snippet: Denis Menchov catapulted from second place to first during the longest — and one of the most dangerous — time trials in cycling, while the American Levi Leipheimer moved into third.
